202720.name: Piercing Blow

202730.full_desc: Boosts all elemental resistance for all allies.
202730.name: Darkness Veil
202730.short_desc: Boost dark resistance for all allies

202740.full_desc: Boosts caster's ATK and enables them to dodge one enemy attack.
202740.name: Concentrate
202740.short_desc: Boost ATK and dodge one attack for caster

202750.full_desc: Boosts ATK when equipped with a sword.
202750.name: Blade Adept
202750.short_desc: Boost ATK when equipped with a sword

202760.full_desc: Boosts MP by 10%, MAG and SPR by 20%.
202760.name: Sticky Fingers
202760.short_desc: Boost MP by 10%, MAG and SPR by 20%

202770.full_desc: Steals gil from an enemy and attacks them.
202770.name: Coin Steal

202780.full_desc: Boosts MP by 10%, ATK and DEF by 20%.
202780.name: Lunge Combo
202780.short_desc: Boost MP by 10%, ATK and DEF by 20%

202790.full_desc: Boosts dark resistance and ATK by 20%
202790.name: Skikkoku
202790.short_desc: Boost dark resistance and ATK by 20%

202800.full_desc: Damages caster for 1/2 their max HP to deal damage to one enemy.
202800.name: Soul Eater
202800.short_desc: Consume caster's HP to damage one enemy

202810.full_desc: Deals dark damage to all enemies.
202810.name: Dark Flame

202820.full_desc: Damages caster for 1/10 their max HP to deal damage equal to 3/4 their current HP.
202820.name: Gravity Ball
202820.short_desc: Consume caster's HP to damage one enemy for 3/4 HP

202830.full_desc: Boosts light resistance and DEF by 20%
202830.name: Holy Light
202830.short_desc: Boost light resistance and DEF by 20%

202840.full_desc: Adds a chance of taking physical damage for an ally while guarding.
202840.name: Saintly Wall

202860.full_desc: Boosts damage inflicted by jump attacks.
202860.name: Dragoon Spirit
202860.short_desc: Boost damage dealt by jump abilities

202870.full_desc: Sends unit into the air then deals damage to one enemy next turn.
202870.name: Dragon Dive
202870.short_desc: Leap into the air, then attack next turn

202880.full_desc: Deals damage to all enemies next turn.
202880.name: Charge Shot

202890.full_desc: Deals critical damage to one enemy.
202890.name: Sharpshot

202940.full_desc: Damages caster for 2/5 their max HP to deal damage to all enemies.
202940.name: Dark Cannon
202940.short_desc: Consume caster's HP to damage all enemies

300010.full_desc: A remnant from the body of a self-destructed bomb. Still smoldering with the fire of its ill-fated master, its flames can be channeled to do damage to foes. Capable of causing extensive destruction to one's surroundings if not careful, fortunately it is typically procurable by only the most experienced of adventurers.
300010.name: Bomb Fragment
300010.short_desc: A small amount of fire damage to one enemy

300020.full_desc: A remnant from the body of a self-destructed bomb. While bomb fragments are commonly seen, fully-intact arms are rare indeed, and naturally prized for the fiery havoc they can wreak on foes. Overeager adventurers looking to procure this treasured item by their own hand have been known to meet an explosive end.
300020.name: Bomb Arm

300030.full_desc: A mystical item with the chill winds of the southern reaches sealed within. Even brought far from its source, it carries enough power to deal a small amount of ice damage. An effective way for those not magically inclined to stand against fire-element foes, even its modest powers can help give an edge in battle.
300030.name: Antarctic Wind
300030.short_desc: A small amount of ice damage to one enemy

300040.full_desc: A mystical item with the blustery winds of the northern reaches sealed within. Potent enough to send chills through one's entire body at the slightest touch, it is a popular accessory in deserts and volcanic areas. When confronted by a formidable enemy of the fiery persuasion, this item can spell the difference between death and a safe escape.
300040.name: North Wind

300050.full_desc: A mystical item said to house the wrath of the god of storms, albeit in minute quantities. Capable of inflicting a modest amount of lightning damage, it is particularly effective against aquatic foes. Though limited in potency, its ease of use among non-mages and having no need for long incantations are significant merits, making it perfect for distracting the enemy and creating an opening.
300050.name: Zeus's Rage
300050.short_desc: A small amount of lightning damage to one enemy

300060.full_desc: A mystical item said to house the wrath of all the gods of the heavens. Capable of inflicting a significant amount of lightning damage, it is remarkably effective against aquatic foes. Its sheer thunderous force is such that it is a challenge for the wielder to so much as stand. It is said to be a popular choice for kidnappers looking to incapacitate their targets before spiriting them away.
300060.name: Wrath of the Gods

300070.full_desc: A scale left behind by a creature of the deep. The power it harbors within is enough to deal a modest amount of water damage to a foe. With some scales shimmering with resplendent colors, they are prized as ornaments as much as for their role in battle. Sadly, one cannot have it both ways, as releasing the scale's power will leave it a ashen husk.
300070.name: Fish Scale
300070.short_desc: A small amount of water damage to one enemy

300080.full_desc: A scale left behind by a water dragon. Harboring great power, it can inflict a significant amount of water damage on a foe. Fisherman and sailors have been known to fashion these scales into talismans, which are said to ward off the dangers of the deep. The careful buyer should avoid buying such trinkets, as most are but replicas of the real thing.
300080.name: Dragon Scale

300090.full_desc: The feather of a great bird, imbued with the power of the wind, capable of dealing a modest amount of wind damage to a foe. The birds from which these feathers are harvested are known to nest atop peaks and mountains, far out of human sight. They are, however, quite territorial, and will not hesitate to descend, talons bared, on anything they consider a threat. If you find one of these feathers, be sure to watch out overhead.
300090.name: Giant Feather
300090.short_desc: A small amount of wind damage to one enemy

300100.full_desc: The feather of a wyvern, imbued with the power of the wind, capable of dealing a significant amount of wind damage to a foe. Harvested only on rare occasions from wyverns, they resemble a miniature dragon's wingone small enough to be carried. Some researchers posit that it is not an actual wing at all, but an embodiment of wind magic that has taken physical form.
300100.name: Wyvern's Feather

300110.full_desc: A mysterious drum said to harbor the power of the earth itself. Capable of inflicting a modest amount of earth damage, it has the unfortunate side effect of creating a rumbling that sweeps one off one's feet, invariably causing the drum to shatter in the process. Historians posit that it was a centerpiece in the dwarven festivals of old.
300110.name: Earth Drum
300110.short_desc: A small amount of earth damage to one enemy

300120.full_desc: A curious item said to harbor the power of the earth. Capable of inflicting significant earth damage on a foe, the force of the tremors it creates are such that they've been known to open fissures in the earth. Said to have been the creation of a legendary dwarf artisan famed as the Son of the Land, the specific details of its origin are shrouded in mystery.
300120.name: Earth Mallet

300130.full_desc: A reddish fang that appears to be the remnant of a fire beast. The power of flame stored within can be unleashed to consume a group of foes in a scorching blaze. Warm to the touch, it is often transported within cloth made from the same materials as a lunar curtain, to prevent the slightest misstep from setting off a rampant wildfire.
300130.name: Red Fang

300140.full_desc: A whitish fang that appears to be the remnant of an ice beast. The power of ice stored within can be unleashed to consume a group of foes in a blustery blizzard. Cold to the touch, it is often transported within cloth made from the same materials as a lunar curtain, to prevent the slightest misstep from setting off a violent snowstorm.
300140.name: White Fang

300150.full_desc: A bluish fang that appears to be the remnant of a lightning beast. The power of ice stored within can be unleashed to consume a group of foes in a blustery blizzard. Cold to the touch, it is often transported within cloth made from the same materials as a lunar curtain, to prevent the slightest misstep from setting off a calamitous tempest.
300150.name: Blue Fang

300160.full_desc: A modern projectile weapon capable of dealing mass damage when thrown at a group of enemies. Developed as a means to strike against mages hurling potent magicks from behind the lines of battle, it is the modern descendent of the throwing stone and the bow and arrow. Chronicles say that the military nation of Zoldaad was the first to employ this technology in actual battle.
300160.name: Grenade

300170.full_desc: A modern projectile weapon capable of dealing mass damage, and furthermore shattering the armor and protection of a group of foes to lower their defenses. An enhanced model of the original grenade designed to make short work of even heavily armored troops, it requires the utmost care and expertise to be used effectively.
300170.name: Frag Grenade
300170.short_desc: Damage and lower DEF for all enemies

300180.full_desc: A ninja throwing weapon. While ninjas are known for the severe training they undergo, perhaps the most fundamental skill is the throwing of a shuriken. It demands complete control of the arm and wrist to send it flying to the vulnerable part of your foe, and only ninjas who hit their target without fail are worthy of their name.
300180.name: Shuriken

300190.full_desc: A ninja throwing weapon. More damaging than a standard-issue shuriken, it is a rare sight at the weaponsmith. Hard to come by even for accomplished ninjas, those who are fortunate to obtain one are known to save it for the most formidable foes. Its distinctive shape and flight path makes aiming a challenge.
300190.name: Magic Shuriken

300200.full_desc: A ninja throwing weapon. More damaging than even a fuma shuriken, its charming appearance conceals its nature as among the most potent weapons a ninja could hope to add to their arsenal. Primarily employed in assassinations, the mere sight of the pinwheel is enough to strike fear into any corrupt bureaucrat's heart. In skilled hands, a single attack can fell the strongest foe.
300200.name: Pinwheel

300210.full_desc: A tonic that restores an ally's health by a small amount. Derived from an ancient recipe referenced in the histories of the Kingdom of Pharm, it is created by blending a number of medicinal herbs. In recent years, improvements to the formula and the wider availability of high-quality ingredients even in less prosperous lands, it is readily available across the realm.
300210.name: Potion
300210.short_desc: Restore a small amount of HP to one ally

300220.full_desc: A tonic that restores an ally's health by a modest amount. With its ingredients harder to come by and the preparation more difficult, it is more expensive than a standard potion, but its potency cannot be denied. While standard potions suffice for everyday injuries, the grave wounds suffered by numerous soldiers in the war between Grandshelt and Zoldaad brought about a need for this potent restorative.
300220.name: Hi-Potion

300230.full_desc: A tonic that restores an ally's health by a significant amount. With the original texts detailing the recipe lost to the chaos of war, only those lucky enough to come upon a relic of the past may reap its considerable healing powers. Potion-makers across the realm work tirelessly to recreate the recipe, hoping to achieve fame and fortune, but their efforts have yet to bear fruit.
300230.name: X-Potion
300230.short_desc: Restore a good deal of HP to one ally

300240.full_desc: A tonic that restores an ally's magical energies by a small amount. A must for any magic-user, its recipe is said to have originated in a kingdom of mages. More expensive than a potion, its ability to instantly restore one's magic makes it treasured by arcane types everywhere. Unfortunately, the ethers most commonly found today are but an imitation of the recipe of old, and their potency is limited.
300240.name: Ether
300240.short_desc: Restore a small amount of MP to one ally

300250.full_desc: A tonic that restores an ally's magical energies by a modest amount. Some scholars posit that this is actually the original recipe from which the less potent ether was derived. No known potion-makers have been able to successfully recreate the formula, and those rare turbo ethers seen in our realm are thought to have found their way here from the hidden nation of mages where they were made. Needless to say, they fetch a high price.
300250.name: Turbo Ether
300250.short_desc: Restore a moderate amount of MP to one ally

300260.full_desc: A fabled arcanum capable of restoring an individual's health and magical energies to full capacity. Said to have been bestowed upon mortals by a deity of light in times of yore, its ingredients and recipe are shrouded in mystery. Its potency is such that those who witness its effects describe it only as a miracle. It is said that any who comes to possess this divine elixir is destined to succeed in their quest.
300260.name: Elixir
300260.short_desc: Fully restore one ally's HP and MP

300270.full_desc: The tailfeather of a bird, able to bring one back from the verge of death. Billed by ambitious merchants as having been plucked from the legendary phoenix, the truth of such claims are unsubstantiated. None can deny its power, however, bringint those who have all but drawn their last breath back to their feet. Many travelers keep one in their pocket as a talisman against unforeseen dangers.
300270.name: Phoenix Down
300270.short_desc: Revive one ally from being KO'd

300280.full_desc: A physic that neutralizes poisons within the body. Effective against a wide variety of toxins, it is an essential for those who come in regular contact with venomous beasts or treacherous poison-wielding foes. Adventurers are encouraged to always keep an ample supply, as healers capable of curing poison with magic are few and far between.
300280.name: Antidote

300290.full_desc: A salve that cures blindness. Having one's line of sight obscured can be a lethal impairment in battle, but a few drops of this medicine will have you seeing your foes clear as day. From its origins as a traditional remedy, the formula was refined by an enterprising salve-maker at the Paapa Pharmacy in Delmagia, whose product has taken the realm by storm.
300290.name: Eye Drop
300290.short_desc: Cure one ally of being blinded

300300.full_desc: A mere whiff of these potent salts will suffice to rouse the smeller from the deepest slumber or stupor. With the kick of a strong spice, followed by a refreshing, nose-clearing sensation, it is known to elicit feelings of elation in the user. Not unlike eye drops, the formula was refined from a traditional home remedy passed down from times of yore.
300300.name: Smelling Salts
300300.short_desc: Cure one ally of sleep or confusion

300310.full_desc: A curious herb that can restore a person's voice, to the point of making one want to shout at the top of one's lungs. With chanting an essential part of spell-casting, losing the ability to speak can subdue even the most potent of magicks. As such, the wisest mages make sure to carry an ample supply of this herb, with many going so far as to grow them in their private gardens.
300310.name: Echo Herbs

300320.full_desc: A horn taken from the fabled beast of legend, with the power to free one from paralysis. Notoriously difficult to acquire, as unicorns are said to reveal themselves only to maidens pure of heart. With the beasts themselves growing rare in recent times, shady merchants have resorted to passing off imitationslet the buyer beware.
300320.name: Unicorn Horn

300330.full_desc: A potent medicine capable of curing the body of disease. A relatively modern invention compared to the traditional potion or antidote, it enters the drinker's bloodstream to increase their immunity to a number of viruses and contagions. Not yet under mass production, it is nowhere to be found at provisioners, being the sole domain of aristocrats and high-ranking officials with the influence and coin to acquire it.
300330.name: Vaccine

300340.full_desc: A curious needle of gold with the power to restore life to those turned to stone. Purified by white mages, the holy essence enters the body through the skin, dissolving the curse of petrifaction from within. While many speak of the glorious feeling of joints and muscles loosening, it has proven ineffective against common shoulder tightness and back pain.
300340.name: Gold Needle

300350.full_desc: A remarkable medicine capable of curing all known ailments. It is said that salve-makers long struggled to master the recipe. What is the proper ratio of echo herbs to smelling salts? At what point in the process should the holy essence of the gold needle be added? Immensely difficult to produce and with ingredients in short supply, this panacea remains a rare treasure to this day.
300350.name: Remedy
300350.short_desc: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion for one ally

300360.full_desc: A tonic that stimulates mind and body. By heightening the imbiber's mental awareness and physical reflexes, it allows them to unleash powerful techniques at a rate far greater than normal. With no known side effects, it is a popular choice for adventurers everywhere, save for those too proud or honorable to rely on medicine to augment their natural abilities.
300360.name: Hyper
300360.short_desc: Cause limit gauge to fill more quickly

300370.full_desc: A mystic curtain with the power to protect one from physical harm. Woven from thread blessed with prayers to imbue it with holy light, it anticipates the movements of enemies and softens the blow of their attacks. Sadly, its power dissipates after but a single use. The holy thread used in its creation is a product of the Olderion Federation.
300370.name: Light Curtain
300370.short_desc: Cast protect on all party members

300380.full_desc: A mystic curtain with the power to protect one from magical harm. Woven from thread blessed with prayers to imbue it with the grace of moonlight, it anticipates the incantations of enemies and lessens the brunt of their spells. Sadly, its power dissipates after but a single use. It is said that they offer greater protection when woven under the light of a full moon.
300380.name: Lunar Curtain
300380.short_desc: Cast shell on all party members

300390.full_desc: A curious device that emits a steady stream of holy water that heals one's wounds over time. According to legend, the familiar name of this item refers to an actual sacred fount that existed in this realm in times of yore, but has been all but forgotten to people in modern times.
300390.name: Healing Spring

300400.full_desc: Long-favored by ninjas, this handy device instantly creates a cloud of smoke that can obstruct the vision of all but the sharpest-eyed of foes. Most commonly employed to distract the enemy and allow the wielder to escape in a pinch, some add foreign substances that cause watering eyes, coughing, and other adverse effects to the inhaler.
300400.name: Smoke Bomb

300410.full_desc: A vigorous tonic that increases the drinker's physical attack power. Due to its extreme potency, only salve-makers with advanced knowledge can stomach it and gain its benefits. Said to have been developed by salve-makers to augment their own physical capabilities on the battlefield, the formula has been refined through the years.
300410.name: Body Boost

300420.full_desc: A vigorous tonic that increases the drinker's magical attack power. Due to its extreme potency, only salve-makers with advanced knowledge can stomach it and gain its benefits. Said to have been developed by salve-makers to augment their own magical capabilities on the battlefield, its lack of drinkability has kept it from reaching wide popularity.
300420.name: Mana Boost

300430.full_desc: A recent invention, this medicine increases the defenses of the drinker for a short period of time. Though highly effective, it is only drinkable by knowledgeable salve-makers, and production remains extremely limited. When seen, it is often marketed with the motto, "A bottle a day keeps the pain away!"
300430.name: Protect Drink

300440.full_desc: A recent invention, this medicine increases the spiritual energy of the drinker for a short period of time. Though highly effective, it is only drinkable by knowledgeable salve-makers, and production remains extremely limited. When seen, it is often marketed with the motto, "A bottle a day, and your worries allay!"
300440.name: Shell Drink

300450.full_desc: A mystical draught said to spout forth endlessly from an enchanted fount. Only consumable by knowledgeable salve-makers, it brings out the latent powers of the drinker, allowing them to exceed their normal physical capacities. As a side-effect, however, it induces obliviousness to one's surroundings and a loss of control, as if the imbiber were in a severe state of inebriation.
300450.name: Bacchus's Wine
300450.short_desc: Inflict berserk status on the user

300460.full_desc: A vigorous tonic that enhances the imbiber's physical attack and defense, magic and spirit. Due to its extreme potency, only salve-makers with advanced knowledge can stomach it and gain its benefits. Be forewarned, however, as its formidable effects can lull one into overconfidence and a false sense of invincibility.
300460.name: Hero Drink
300460.short_desc: Temporarily boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR

300470.full_desc: A vigorous tonic that imbues the drinker with the stamina of a giant, doubling the amount of damage they can withstand for the course of a battle. Due to its extreme potency, only salve-makers with advanced knowledge can stomach it and gain its benefits. Some posit that the name is not merely a metaphor, but that giants consume this medicine as mere mortals consume ordinary potions.
300470.name: Giant's Drink

300480.full_desc: A torch that burns with a divine flame. Waving it at a foe will dispel any enhancements and augmentations that may surround them. Its flame, which burns in perpetuity, is strangely cold to the touch, and has never been known to cause fires. So potent is it that great heroes that have overcome any trials in their way are often sung of as "holy torches" in the ballads of bards.
300480.name: Holy Torch

400070.full_desc: Automatically casts protect when near death.
400070.name: Emergency Protect

400080.full_desc: Automatically casts shell when near death.
400080.name: Emergency Shell

400090.full_desc: Automatically casts regen when near death.
400090.name: Emergency Regen

400100.full_desc: Deals a four hit combo to one enemy.
400100.name: Quad Strike

400110.full_desc: Decreases chance of encountering monsters by half.
400110.name: Reduce Encounter

400120.full_desc: Enables normal attack to hit two times.
400120.name: Two-Hit Combo

500010.full_desc: Deals damage to all enemies and allies.
500010.name: Blunder
500010.short_desc: Damage to all enemies and allies

500040.full_desc: Cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, and confusion for one ally.
500040.name: Remedy
500040.short_desc: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion for one ally

500060.full_desc: Fully restores HP for all allies.
500060.name: Six Dragons
500060.short_desc: Fully restore HP for all allies

500080.full_desc: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
500080.name: Power Generator

500090.full_desc: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
500090.name: Laser Cannon

500110.full_desc: Disables unit from moving for one turn.
500110.name: Failure

500120.full_desc: Restores a small amount of MP for one ally.
500120.name: Chocolate
500120.short_desc: Restore a small amount of MP to one ally

500130.full_desc: Deals damage to one enemy and confuses them.
500130.name: Firebomb
500130.short_desc: Fire damage and confuse one enemy

500140.full_desc: Deals damage to one enemy and inflicts them with disease.
500140.name: Dagger Toss
500140.short_desc: Physical damage and disease one enemy

900000.full_desc: Deals dark damage to one enemy.
900000.name: Void Vessel

900001.full_desc: A group of forward-thinking magi toiled to create a series of magic scrolls able to be wielded even by those not blessed with the power of magic. This particular scroll enhances the magical powers of an entire party, but is itself consumed after a single use.
900001.name: Scroll of Acumen
900001.short_desc: Boost MAG and SPR for all allies

900002.full_desc: A group of forward-thinking magi toiled to create a series of magic scrolls able to be wielded even by those not blessed with the power of magic. This particular scroll enhances the physical powers of an entire party, but is itself consumed after a single use.
900002.name: Scroll of Vigor
900002.short_desc: Boosts ATK and DEF for all allies

900003.full_desc: A vial full of healing liquid made from various mixtures. While your standard health potion mixes in various herbs and spices, the Y-Potion goes one step further, including pure ether among its ingredients. As a result, the potion gives its user a slight kick as it refreshes them. Its side effects are never fatal, and are usually gastric-related.
900003.name: Y-Potion
900003.short_desc: Restores a significant amount of health to one ally.

900004.full_desc: A vial that greatly reinvigorates exhausted magic users. This concoctions properties are only known to a small group of court magi in a faraway kingdom. It restores magical energy far more efficiently than other similar potions of its kind. Perhaps this is due to the fact that its method of creation is far more strict and precise.
900004.name: Mega Ether
900004.short_desc: Restores a significant amount of MP to one ally.

900006.full_desc: Deals damage unaffected by DEF to one enemy.
900006.name: Stab

900008.full_desc: Deals damage to all enemies, and paralyzes them.
900008.name: Boo!

900009.name: Survivor's Flask
900009.short_desc: Delay effect of Death Declaration for three turns

900014.full_desc: Deals magic damage and drain HP to all enemies.
900014.name: Reap Blood
900014.short_desc: Damage and drain HP to all enemies

910001.full_desc: Adds a chance of taking physical damage for an ally.
910001.name: Demonic Cover
910001.short_desc: Chance of taking physical damage for ally

910002.full_desc: Adds a chance of taking physical damage for an ally while guarding.
910002.name: Cerberus Guard

910003.full_desc: Boosts ATK when HP drops below a certain level.
910003.name: Demonic Fury
910003.short_desc: Boost ATK when HP drops below a certain level

910004.full_desc: Boosts ATK and MAG for all allies.
910004.name: Ignite
910004.short_desc: Boost ATK and MAG for all allies

910006.full_desc: Greatly decreases chance of being targeted.
910006.name: Bat Form
910006.short_desc: Greatly decrease chance of being targeted

910008.full_desc: Deals damage to all enemies. Boosts ATK against reaper type monsters.
910008.name: Hallowed Song
910008.short_desc: Damage and undead killer to all enemies

910009.full_desc: Consumes 1/5 of caster's max HP to deal damage to all enemies, and inflicts Sleep.
910009.name: Black Mist
910009.short_desc: Consume caster's HP to damage all enemies and inflict sleep

910010.full_desc: Deals damage to one enemy, and reduces their ATK, DEF, and ice resistance.
910010.name: Nightmare Assault
910010.short_desc: Damage and reduce ATK, DEF and ice resistance for one enemy

910011.full_desc: Boosts SPR by 20% and MP by 10%.
910011.name: SPR +20%, MP +10%
910011.short_desc: Boost SPR by 20% and MP by 10%

910012.full_desc: Deals light damage to all enemies. Boosts ATK against reaper type monsters.
910012.name: Divine Burst
910012.short_desc: Light damage and undead killer to all enemies

910013.full_desc: Restores HP/MP for all allies except self.
910013.name: Ritual
910013.short_desc: Restore HP and MP for all allies except self

910014.full_desc: Boosts ATK by 10% and HP by 20%.
910014.name: ATK +10%, HP +20%
910014.short_desc: Boost ATK by 10% and HP by 20%

910015.full_desc: Deals damage and random status ailments to one enemy.
910015.name: Hex Strike
910015.short_desc: Damage and inflict random status ailment on one enemy

910016.full_desc: Deals damage unaffected by DEF to one enemy.
910016.name: Ultimate Blow

910017.full_desc: Boosts ATK and MAG when HP drops below a certain level.
910017.name: Knight's Wrath
910017.short_desc: Boost ATK and MAG when HP drops below a certain level
